meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Phyllis Grayson David Zack Kara Spak Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5987.

td.p: Phyllis Grayson, a retired CPA from Huntersville, North Carolina
David Zack, a web developer originally from Fairfield, Connecticut
Kara Spak, a newspaper reporter from Chicago, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $52,802)

tr.td: SHOWTIME AT THE ACROPOLIS
BOY SCOUT ACTIVITIES
NURSERY RHYME PEOPLE
INTERIOR DESIGN
EASY ON THE EYES
I LOVE YOU, "MIN"
